name: Tale Of The Lambton Worm
description:
The Tale of The Lambton Worm:

Set in sunderland 1970 you play as John Lambton on a quest to track down and kill the beast known as the Lambton worm. The game begins from your arrival back to the city after a long voyage at sea, you are met with scared villagers fearing for their lives in this small yet peaceful area, after asking some questions and doing some investigating you come to the conclusion that you are in great danger. After meeting with many people you must collect your weapons and attempt to fight the beast.

Jordan Robson

Devon Jenkin-Hunt

Owen Bates

Travis Young

Keilan Ramsden

Marcus Eley

Jake Langley
